products.name: M8
products.description: KRISCHER M8 in collaboration with the talented Nimloss Kano. 100% handmade in Paris, 8 powerful analog oscillators.

products.name: Micro 3340
products.description:
100% analog monophonic synthesizer based on the fabulous VCO 3340!
4 powerful waveforms selector : Noise, triangle, sawtooth, square with pwm control.
Controllable in 1v/octave CV and Gate.

Available as a DIY kit or assembled.

products.name: MicroFilter
products.description:
This clone of the mythical MS-20 vintage filter offers a spectacular Lowpass with a powerful resonance!
The cutoff is controllable with the potentiometer and Control Voltage (CV)

Available as a DIY kit or assembled.

description: Krischer is a Paris based synth maker who sells on Reverb.
